actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to require that any mass transportation system receiving Federal assistance under the act comply with certain notice and hearing requirements before the establishment or change of any fare or certain services.

summary.text: Amends the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to require that any mass transportation under such Act comply with specified notice and hearing requirements before the establishment or change of any fare or service which substantially affects the community.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to require that any mass transportation system receiving Federal assistance under the act comply with certain notice and hearing requirements before the establishment or change of any fare or certain services.
